Info.Title: Back to the Future Part III
Info.Writer: Robert Zemeckis (characters), Bob Gale (characters), Robert Zemeckis (story), Bob Gale (story), Bob Gale (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen, Thomas F. Wilson
Info.Plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure out a way to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.
